page.content: It has been featured favorably in The Obsever,Womans Own and The Standard. Prices range from Â£80 per week for full board,a small room with no view out of season to Â£168 for a suite in high season.{TREDRAGON HOTEL}:was the first hotel and second building in Mawgan Porth.It was used as a hospital during the war. It has been in the Brown Family for 23 years and now has 30 bedrooms,two villas and an indoor pool in 3 acres of land.Many famous and foreign people stay as well as family parties and retired people. {TRENANCE FARM HOUSE:}opposite the working farm on the coastroad offers Bed and breakfast of the traditional farmhouse style.If you head North out of ST.Mawgan up the hill,you will pass The Forge Garage and the Methodist Hall.Go on past the greenhouses that supply Bedruthan Steps Hotel.
